The Data

Police data for July to December 2025 shows South Ribble averaging 810 crimes per month across its 23 wards.

Busiest Wards

  • Bamber Bridge East: ~70 crimes/month
  • Middleforth: ~65 crimes/month (includes Leyland town centre areas)
  • Broadfield: ~53 crimes/month
  • Bamber Bridge West: ~52 crimes/month
  • St Ambrose: ~51 crimes/month

Quietest Wards

  • Hoole: ~15 crimes/month
  • Longton & Hutton West: ~14 crimes/month
  • Howick & Priory: ~18 crimes/month

See ward-level crime data and deprivation scores on our My Area page.
